author: Jed Dye
comment: WILL SPAM YOU TO BUY THEIR OTJER APPS DO NOT INSTALL. Miss some configuration items such as how long I want the screen to stay on. Also, main issue is that there's just not enough cities!!!

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Jed, My sincere apologize,We assure you we wont be send any ads of our other app to you in future ,kindly reconsider your reviews ,Thank you

title: SPAM APP DO NOT INSTALL

author: Alex Webster
comment: Not bad. Lacking some customization, for example weather needs an option for Fahrenheit. User-defined color settings seems easy to implement and would be nice too. Update: big battery drain, uninstalled.

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. You can change the temperature scale into fahrenheit in current version, Kindly check it under Time zone 2 settings.. For any further assistance please reach us at wearables@insideglobe.com

title: Not bad, needs more customization

author: Behnam Rs
comment: Cluttered and unreadable and the colors are brighter and not refined at all on the watch, it looks like an incomplete idea with old design

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Behnam ,We are very much sorry that our watch face disappoint you  but thank you for sharing your view about our watch faces

author: Abhishek Thorat
comment: Not reflecting on watch.  Not button or option in app to set it to watch

reply.author: Inside Globe Inc
reply.content: Hi Abhishek ,We are very much sorry that our watch face disappoint you ,check this link for details information http://bit.ly/2cPO69s ,you can also long press the watch face to use the setting and change the option like color ,time zone etc., Thanks for the time
